experience.title: Senior AI Engineer
details: Designed and deployed a multilingual retrieval-augmented generation chatbot using GPT-4, Pinecone vector database, LangChain, and LlamaIndex, which significantly improved semantic search and knowledge retrieval across various data formats.

experience.title: Machine Learning Engineer
details: Developed and deployed production-grade real-time object detection models using YOLOv5, EfficientDet, and Detectron2, integrated with OpenCV to process video streams for industrial quality inspection systems.
Achieved a 60% inference speedup on Nvidia Jetson TX2 edge devices through aggressive model pruning, TensorRT quantization, and custom CUDA kernel optimizations tailored for edge deployment.
Built scalable FastAPI inference services deployed on Kubernetes clusters managed with Helm charts, enabling zero-downtime rolling updates and autoscaling based on real-time load.
Automated model retraining workflows using Apache Airflow, integrating DVC and MLflow for dataset and experiment versioning to ensure reproducibility and traceability.
Designed advanced monitoring dashboards with Grafana and Prometheus to track inference latency, accuracy drift, and edge device resource utilization, enabling proactive system maintenance.
Developed complex image augmentation pipelines using Albumentations, significantly improving model robustness against varying lighting, noise, and occlusions.
Integrated MQTT protocols for real-time anomaly detection alerting and telemetry across distributed edge devices, enhancing system reliability.
Mentored junior engineers and contributed extensive documentation covering computer vision model development, deployment pipelines, and troubleshooting guides.
Collaborated closely with embedded systems teams to optimize model deployment on resource-constrained devices, balancing inference throughput and power consumption.
Utilized PyTorch, TensorFlow, and OpenVINO frameworks for efficient model training, conversion, and deployment workflows.
Automated CI/CD pipelines leveraging GitHub Actions to validate model builds and container images, improving deployment reliability.

experience.title: Machine Learning Engineer
details: Developed and deployed robust fraud detection systems utilizing LightGBM, XGBoost, and CatBoost, processing transactional and behavioral data to significantly reduce false positive rates.
Engineered temporal and aggregated features through optimized SQL queries and Apache Spark pipelines, enabling near real-time fraud risk scoring.
Applied advanced NLP techniques, including LDA topic modeling, BERT finetuning, and sentence embeddings, to extract actionable insights from customer support tickets and communications.
Built RESTful APIs with Flask to serve real-time fraud alerts and model predictions, integrated with existing CRM platforms for seamless operations.
Managed the end-to-end ML lifecycle using MLflow, securely storing artifacts in AWS S3 for reproducible experiments and model governance.
Created interactive visualizations using Tableau and Plotly to communicate model performance metrics and business impacts to stakeholders clearly.
Conducted rigorous A/B testing and statistical analysis to validate model improvements and quantify impacts on customer churn prediction and fraud prevention.
Automated feature engineering pipelines with Apache Airflow and optimized SQL to streamline data preparation and model training processes.
Trained and mentored junior data scientists on model explainability tools such as SHAP, LIME, and ELI5 to increase transparency and trust in ML models.
Delivered over 20% increase in fraud detection precision, substantially reducing manual review workload and improving operational efficiency.

experience.title: Data Scientist
details: Built recommendation systems employing collaborative filtering, matrix factorization, and hybrid models to personalize e-learning content delivery and enhance user engagement.

Implemented foundational NLP pipelines using NLTK and spaCy for tokenization, named entity recognition, and normalization tasks critical to downstream applications.
Containerized ML workflows and services with Docker, ensuring consistent development environments and facilitating cloud deployment.
Collaborated with frontend teams to embed ML model outputs into interactive dashboards, significantly enhancing user engagement and insight delivery.
Actively participated in sprint planning, code reviews, and testing to maintain high-quality project delivery and ensure robustness.
Supported migration of ML workloads to AWS EC2 instances, developing batch inference jobs to enable offline model predictions.

experience.title: Data Analyst
details: Conducted exploratory data analysis on customer behavior datasets using Pandas and Excel, identifying key marketing trends and actionable patterns to inform business decisions.
Automated report generation through Python scripting and Excel macros, reducing manual workload and improving reporting efficiency.
Developed data cleaning pipelines leveraging Pandas to prepare raw data for modeling and statistical analysis.
Assisted in building basic customer segmentation predictive models under guidance, contributing to marketing campaign targeting efforts.
Documented data processing pipelines and analytical methodologies to ensure reproducibility and promote knowledge sharing within the team.
Conducted root cause analysis and validation to address data quality issues and ensure reliability of datasets used for business intelligence.
Supported ad hoc data requests and prepared visual reports for internal stakeholders, facilitating data-driven decision making.
Actively contributed ideas in team brainstorming sessions to improve data infrastructure and workflows.
